username_null: Username cannot be null in another languages
username_size: Must have min 4 and max 32 characters in another languages
email_null: E-mail cannot be null in another languages
email_invalid: E-mail is not valid in another languages
password_null: Password cannot be null in another languages
password_size: Password must be at least 6 characters in another languages
password_pattern: Password must have at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number in another languages
email_inuse: E-mail in use in other languages
account_activation_failure: This account is either active or the token is invalid in other languages
account_activation_success: Account is activated in other languages
